About Me

I love full-stack development and data analytics almost as much as I love gummi worms.

I'll be starting school at Northeastern University in Boston, MA in the fall of 2017. There, I will be studying Data Science.

I am considering taking a gap year to work to pay off tuition expenses.

Projects

Some stuff I did

DR Prescreen Optimization

I built a prescreening test for diabetic retinopathy that raised the sensitivity of a diagnosis to 97% while still maintaining a .85 area under the curve (AUC).
